termsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
termsAndConditions.checkboxLabel: I have read and agree to the Terms and Conditions

facilityTerms.title: Product Registration Terms
facilityTerms.checkboxLabel: I have read and agree to Terms and Conditions
facilityTerms.checkboxLabel2: I don't want to accept terms and conditions

termsAndConsent.paragraph1: The products and systems provided by EC Power may in certain cases be considered as critical infrastructure. Therefore, we recommend that you register your products and/or systems on product registration portal (Productportal.ecpower.net). It is optional whether you choose to take advantage of this opportunity, but registration is necessary for you to obtain the benefits it offers. Registration allows us to contact you in case an incident occurs that may have an impact on products and/or systems provided by EC Power and to provide your service partner with the technical data they need to support the operation and maintenance of your products and/or systems.
termsAndConsent.paragraph2: EC Power is the data controller for the processing of personal data that takes place in connection with your use of the product registration portal. When you register your products and/or systems on the product registration portal, you agree that your personal data is processed in accordance with these terms.
termsAndConsent.paragraph3: The term "EC Power" or "us" or "we" refers to EC Power A/S, Samsøv 25, 8382 Hinnerup, Denmark, business registration number: 19228509.
termsAndConsent.paragraph4: The term "product" refers to products and/or systems you have registered on the product registration portal.
termsAndConsent.paragraph5: The term 'you' refers to the product owner and/or user who is registered in the product registration portal.
termsAndConsent.paragraph6: The information we process: To register your product, you must create a user account. To do so, you must select a password for your account and provide your personal identification details (name and surname), contact details (telephone number and email address) and business details (business name, address, email address, telephone number and registration number). In addition, you must also provide product identification details (product name, model, XRGI ID-number and installation address) and the name and contact details of your sales- and/or service partner.
termsAndConsent.paragraph7: In addition to this information, we process technical data generated by your product, including but not limited to: - Master data, i.e. information about model, type and XRGI ID-number. - Operating data, i.e. information about operating status, operating hours, condition of components such as faults, defects, etc. - Performance data, i.e. information about performance characteristics. - Service and maintenance data, i.e. information about when service and maintenance is required.
termsAndConsent.paragraph8: The information we process about you is personal data. In rare cases, technical data generated by your product may also constitute personal data. This only applies if information about you or about the user(s) of the product can be deducted from the technical data.
termsAndConsent.paragraph9: How we use information: We use the information we process about you to contact you if an incident occurs that may impact your product, e.g. if we are subject to a cyber or hacker attack. Furthermore, information can be used to inform you about the current condition of your product, e.g. service and maintenance requirements, or in the event of a risk of impending damage to the product.
termsAndConsent.paragraph10: The technical data generated by your product is used by us, our affiliated companies and our business partners to further develop and improve our products and systems, including for ensuring and optimising product operation, identifying potential sources of errors and for preparing statistical analysis.
termsAndConsent.paragraph11: The technical data is shared with your service partner for the purpose of technical support, fault diagnosis, product monitoring etc. This enables your service partner to keep you up to date about your product and to provide you with customised service and support for your product and maximise its performance and functionality.
termsAndConsent.paragraph12: Legal basis and data retention: The information that constitutes personal data is processed in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). The legal basis for processing is article 6(1)(f) GDPR and our legitimate interest in providing information to you in case of an incident that may affect the operation of the product and in making technical data available to service partners for technical support and ongoing operation and maintenance purposes.
termsAndConsent.paragraph13: As a general rule, information is retained until the product is decommissioned, after which the information is deleted.
termsAndConsent.paragraph14: However, you can delete or update information in your user account at any time, e.g. add or delete products or change your service partner. If you delete products from your user account, we will no longer be able to attribute the technical data generated by these products to you. You also have the option to delete your user account at any time by logging into your user account and using the delete account function.
termsAndConsent.paragraph15: Security: EC Power is NIS2 compliant and has implemented technical and operational security measures to protect against digital threats and ensure an appropriate level of security.
termsAndConsent.paragraph16: Data subject rights: Under the provisions of the GDPR, you have the right to request access to the information we process about you. If incorrect personal data has been processed, you have the right to have the information rectified. If there is a legal basis, you may request erasure or restricted processing and you may object to data processing. You may also exercise your right to data portability or lodge a complaint with the supervisory authority. To exercise your rights, please contact us at info@ecpower.eu.
